channel.title: Chapter06s on Datenverarbeitung in der Medienproduktion

item.title: Übung 6 - BMesh
item.description: BMesh BMesh Vertices bewegen Anwendung? Funktion plotten, Terrain / Fraktal generieren? Meshmanipulation Codebeispiel BMesh Einführung # This example assumes we have a mesh object selected import bpy import bmesh # Get the active mesh me = bpy.context.object.data # Get a BMesh representation bm = bmesh.new() # create an empty BMesh bm.from_mesh(me) # fill it in from a Mesh # Modify the BMesh, can do anything here... for v in bm.
